item.title: About
item.description: I am Alex working in tech since 1999 wore many hats spent lots of hours in Ops side spent lots of hours as platform engineer Currently focussed in cloud-native and hybrid environments Certs
item.content:
I am Alex

  • working in tech since 1999
  • wore many hats
  • spent lots of hours in Ops side
  • spent lots of hours as platform engineer

Currently focussed in cloud-native and hybrid environments
